description: This file defines an Android activity named PlayerActivity that handles media playback using ExoPlayer. It manages the lifecycle of the media player, initializes it with a video URL, and handles user interactions such as back navigation.

classes.name: PlayerActivity
classes.description: An Android activity for playing videos using ExoPlayer, handling lifecycle events and user input.

methods.name: onCreate
methods.description: Initializes the activity, sets up UI components, and retrieves video information from intent extras.

methods.name: onStart
methods.description: Starts the player when the activity becomes visible.

methods.name: onStop
methods.description: Releases the player resources when the activity is no longer visible.

methods.name: onKeyUp
methods.description: Handles key events, specifically the back button to allow quick navigation.

methods.name: initializePlayer
methods.description: Sets up the ExoPlayer instance and prepares it with the media URI.

methods.name: createIntent
methods.description: Creates an intent to start PlayerActivity with specified video title and URL.
